title: The Fourth alarm
creator_credit: Hal Roach, Hal Roach Studios, Pathé Frères and Robert F. McGowan
brief_description: The local fire chief allows the “Our Gang” kids to play in the fire department yeard. Whilst the firemen are on an emergency call, a small fire breaks out in the kitchen of a house nearby. “Our Gang” come to the rescue and the kids manage to extinguish the fire in the midst of some comic hijinks. The grateful chief gives all the kids a fire chief badge making them regular members of the fire department.
